test = int(raw_input())
while test>0 :
	s = raw_input()
	p = 1
	g = 1
	ss = s[::-1]
	if s != ss :
		p = 0
	li = 'abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz'
	for i in li:
		if i not in s:
			g = 0
			break
	if p == 1 and g==1:
		print('palingram')
	elif p==1 and g==0:
		print('palindrome')
	elif p==0and g==1:
		print('pangram')
	else:
		print('none')
	test-=1
